channel.title: How do you make an NPC do an emote?
channel.description:
Hello, I am Zirak it is nice to meet you. But can you help me on a problem... Seems like I can't find a way yet to make an npc do an emote... So can some one help me figure it out? or Just tell me how to do it? If you decide to Keep it private then that is ok too... If i make any tutorial on it or something about it i will always give credits to who helped me on this. So please Help thank you!
~Zirak

item.title: How do you make an NPC do an emote?

item.title: How do you make an NPC do an emote?
item.dc:creator: @Zirakac Zirakac
item.description:
@Zirakac wrote:

No, I am pretty sure it will require an extra VOID in the server to make it work…

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make an NPC do an emote?
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Snipe Ancient Snipe
item.description:
@Ancient_Snipe wrote:

def leppard:

you can only make knights dance is what i knowdunno how to…

No… they are already dancing

if npcid = **
{
emote=**
}

something like that

item.title: How do you make an NPC do an emote?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I dont think its actually possislb to make npc’s do emotes. only to make you do one. I know what you mean, it must be possible somehow.
